title: Advisory: Vice President Biden To Travel To Illinois And Texas Next Week | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 23, 2009

 



Advisory: Vice President Biden To Travel To Illinois And Texas Next Week




THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Vice President    ---------------------------------------  For Immediate Release           April 23, 2009   **MEDIA ADVISORY**   VICE PRESIDENT BIDEN TO TRAVEL TO ILLINOIS AND TEXAS NEXT WEEK On Monday April 27th, Vice President Biden will travel to Chicago, Illinois. While in Chicago, Vice President Biden will speak at the 2009 Richard J. Daley Urban Forum and hold a Recovery Act event. On Tuesday April 28th, the Vice President will be in Austin, Texas where he will visit the National Domestic Violence Hotline Center and attend a Democratic National Committee lunch. Then, the Vice President will travel to Houston, Texas to attend a Democratic National Committee dinner. The Vice President will return to Washington DC in the evening. Additional media details and logistics will follow shortly. ###
